item.description:
This is a Telephone Meetup for BostonLOA members interested in participating in a Master Key System Study Group.

Tonight, we'll be discussing Lesson 6.

** Please take the time to read Lesson 6, do the activities and
be ready to discuss & share.

We have established a Yahoo! group for our Master Key System Study
Group. Please join this group to participate. You'll have access to the
lesson materials, telephone bridge # and forum.

http://groups.yahoo.c...

When:
Monday, November 19, 2007 ; 9:00 - 10:00 PM

Where:
TELEPHONE

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Master Key Study Group - BY PHONE
